name: React JS
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of React JS for building modern web applications using reusable components and a component-based architecture. Emphasis is placed on practical development, JSX, hooks, and managing state.

name: Node.js
description: An introduction to server-side development with Node.js, this course covers building scalable and efficient back-end applications using JavaScript runtime. Topics include Express.js, asynchronous programming, and RESTful APIs.

name: MongoDB
description: A practical course on MongoDB, focusing on document-oriented NoSQL database management, schema design, aggregation framework, and data modeling for modern applications.

name: JavaScript
description: This course covers core JavaScript concepts, including variables, functions, DOM manipulation, and event handling. It prepares students to write interactive web applications with strong programming fundamentals.

name: TypeScript
description: An introduction to TypeScript, focusing on type-safe JavaScript development. Topics include interfaces, generics, classes, and integrating TypeScript into React projects for enhanced maintainability and scalability.

name: Git & GitHub
description: This course provides foundational knowledge of version control using Git and GitHub. Students will learn how to track changes, collaborate on projects, resolve merge conflicts, and use branching strategies effectively.

name: HTML & CSS
description: A comprehensive introduction to web development using HTML and CSS. Topics include semantic markup, responsive design, layout techniques, and styling fundamentals essential for building modern websites.
